title: Facebook Sync 2.0 (AKA FacebookSync)
description:
This is the version of FacebookSync that Facebook doesn&#039;t want you to have because it violates their terms of service. The author, http://fsbsoftware.com/index.html has been told by Facebook to stop distributing this version, and they complied. So here it is in its original goodness.

All it does is syncs your Apple Address Book with your Facebook contacts, so you can have their pictures, email addresses (using OCR), addresses, and AIM names. Very useful!
